definition: a speedboat that is equipped with winglike structures that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds
details:
noun
- a speedboat that is equipped with winglike structures that lift it so that it skims the water at high speeds
= synonyms: hydroplane
- a device consisting of a flat or curved piece, as a metal plate, so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through
= example: a device consisting of a flat or curved piece, as a metal plate, so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through
= synonyms: foil
